attributes.action: Stop Adele from taking a break
attributes.additional_details: For purely selfish reasons can we stop Adele from taking a 5 year break? She’s obviously an incredible artist and would be missed in the music industry. In terms of actions let’s support her and write creative music for her to sing to if she’s out of ideas, there’s plenty of youngsters in this country with stories to tell. Let’s create a scheme. Come on Britain!! We’ve already invested in this! Log your vote!
